title: How to identify old coins - Quora

response.answer_text: Read Numismatic Related Books Join Like minded People in Societies/Forum/Groups etc Indian Coins is a VERY vast Subject and We have a Continuous Coinage from 6 C.B.C. and many many kings/kigdom/dynasty etc in such vast period. if U have Few coins, Do photograph and upload here , Many People can help in Identification.
